channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Some keeps letting their dog foul right on the corner, 7th December
item.description:
Welcome Park Road and Beaconsfield Road. It’s happening multiple times a week and is a major nuisance and health hazard.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Beaconsfield Road, Blackheath
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Diverted traffic sign, 7th December
item.description:
This is the sixth time I've reported this. There is a "Diverted Traffic" sign on the pavement at the junction of Terrace Rd and Cassland Rd. It has been there for months. On Nov 13th I received an email from Hackney council saying it would be removed.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Terrace Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Frig freezer laying on footpath, 7th December
item.description:
This was placed last night when dark by a resident.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lugard Road, Peckham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Shopping trolley, toilet, furniture, rubbish just left on the pavement, 7th December
item.description:
People are using the street as a skip, putting out rubbish. Peckham Liberal club possibly responsible for shopping trolley full of empty alcohol bottles

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 21, Elm Grove, Peckham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping outside convenience store, 7th December
item.description:
This is a fly tipping hot spot, with there being domestic waste in bags dumped by the bin and/or furniture tipped on a daily basis.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Woolwich Road, Greenwich
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lots of graffiti on wall, 7th December
item.description:
Lots of graffiti on wall on Crystal Palace Parade bordering Southwark and permitter wall is for Guy’s and St Thomas estate premises.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Crystal Palace Parade, Crystal Palace, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped sofas, 7th December
item.description:
This has been here since Saturday 6th Dec at least

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Combedale Road, Greenwich
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street is full of litter and has been for months, 7th December
item.description:
Discarded bottles, bags, rice, people’s litter has been dumped and blow everywhere. No one collects it. More litter is being dumped now.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 21, Elm Grove, Peckham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped paving slabs, 7th December
item.description:
Looks like builders have dumped paving no slabs

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Victorian Grove, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Standing water on road, 7th December
item.description:
Every time it rains, water is left standing on the corner of Harcourt Road for hours until it slowly drains away. This has been an ongoing issue for years. Please address.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Harcourt Road, Blendon, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:
Flytipped bed near pedestrian entrance to Joseph Powell close

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hazelbourne Road, Clapham, Greater London

item.title: Dumped bag of rubbish, 7th December
item.description:
Bag of rubbish left on pavement

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bromley Gardens, Shortlands, Greater London

item.title: Large pothole on mini roundabout, 7th December
item.description:
The pothole has been there for about a week and is getting worse. This will cause damage to vehicles and possibly cause an accident.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Elmstead Lane, Elmstead, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overflowing rubbish bins, 7th December
item.description:
The rubbish has been overflowing from the ONE communal bin for almost a week. Open bin bags on the tow bath with contents all over the floor- [sanitary products, food waste etc] highly unsanitary. It’s absolutely disgusting walking through it.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Wallis Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dog mess, 7th December
item.description:
There is persistant dog mess on street pavement. We have not been able to identify the person(s) responsible, but it is getting quite bad.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Orsman Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Parked On a double yellow line, 7th December
item.description:
Parked on a double yellow line on Sunday 7 December (and abused passers by). Should be issued with ticket. Car registration number - LM16 EYC

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 54, Chase Side, Southgate, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Wet "muddy" leaves, 7th December
item.description:
So many wet and muddy leaves. Very slippery. Not safe.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, High Street, Poverest, Greater London

item.title: Recycling bin left in incorrect place has created new fly tipping site, 7th December
item.description:
This recycling bin has been left out in the wrong place (it used to presumably be in a bin storage area?) and seems to have created a new fly tipping site. can the council please rectify this and place the bin where it belongs. it’s been left next to 22 loder street

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Loder Street, Peckham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Please empty the Recycle bins, 7th December
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): The Knoll, Beckenham, Greater London
